channel.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
channel.description:
Yeah, Dont tell me to google search it doesnt work and you are not answering the question.
I need to know where I go to add them, how to add them, and any code necessary. I am looking to add kbd, fight pits, maybe clan wars but main one is godwars, godwars is imperative to my server really need godwars...
I know its not easy to add minigames and areas and stuff, but if you could help me with this I would be very grateful :)

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:
@nerdboyxx wrote:

I find it hard to learn off the website, it is too technical for me, they use too many different words with very little description to what each part means, and each description leads to more questions that dont get answered until chapter’s 3 or 4 (and thats just the hello world application, dont worry I know how to make it lol im not a complete failure). I am looking for a different method of learning the language, something where I can actually have full descriptions of what is going on and slowly leanr it at my own pace without been stuck on a chapter because I dont know what some fancy term means.

I am looking for a visual, descriptive, and understandable tutorial that will cover at least the basics.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There isn’t just a tutorial on creating them. There are tutorials for creating certain ones, but what is the fun in adding someone else’s work and game?

Like Jc said, all you need to know is basic integers and probably booleans to create a simple mini-game.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:
@nerdboyxx wrote:

yeah I am slowly learning it, it’s difficult though If you could point me to tutorials for minigames though I’d be very grateful

Read full topic

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

nerdboyxx:

lol thanks very much, I really do need godwars. On my server currently, All you can do to get a gs is kill a chaos elemental get a key open a chest and get a random gs kinda dodgy lol. A proper godwars would be great, just one where you have the npc’s to kill and get the actual gs

I suggest you learn a bit more about the language of Java, instead of requesting us to create a minigame for you.
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:

kk thanks

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

[quote=“nerdboyxx, post:5, topic:269351”]Ummm…I prefer the second option but If it might be a bit too advanced (well no shit lol) then I guess I’ll go for the first. I dont have those npc’s (like the zammy gwars boss bandos gwars boss etc.) in any of my server files, I cant find them anywhere. I have to add them to the game and stuff which might take a while but Im sure it would be quicker and a bit better than making an entire gwars lol.

Ill go with the first option :)[/quote]
alright well im kinda busy right now but ill get back to you when i get back on the comp and if i feel kind enough ill write a tut on tokens and etc so you can understand how to do the second option

Read full topic

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:

Ummm…I prefer the second option but If it might be a bit too advanced (well no shit lol) then I guess I’ll go for the first. I dont have those npc’s (like the zammy gwars boss bandos gwars boss etc.) in any of my server files, I cant find them anywhere. I have to add them to the game and stuff which might take a while but Im sure it would be quicker and a bit better than making an entire gwars lol.

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

nerdboyxx:

lol thanks very much, I really do need godwars. On my server currently, All you can do to get a gs is kill a chaos elemental get a key open a chest and get a random gs kinda dodgy lol. A proper godwars would be great, just one where you have the npc’s to kill and get the actual gs

do you want it so you can just teleport to a area and kill an npc and it gives you a godsword or do you want the proper godwars where you have to add tokens and have kill counts so you can enter a certain area then vs the boss and earn a gs from him?

the 2nd choice might be a little to hard for you

Read full topic

item.title: Adding minigames and areas [[Another question :P]]
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

ok firstly do you know how to move/add npcs?
if not
its all in your autospawn.cfg
and as for adding godwars its a little more complicated if you want a proper godwars your going to need to know how to add tokens. I’m pretty sure someone has written a tutorial ill see if i can find it, it will save me 30 mins of my time.

Read full topic
